overview: Brandi is a bored housewife with nothing but time on her hands and a vibrator in her pussy to keep her company. That is, until one day stepdaughter Halle skips school and accidentally walks in on her new mommy mid-orgasm. Rather than tell her father, Brandi seduces the teen into their first lesbian experience. You know what they say: once a lesbian, always a lesbian. Witness Brandi's sexual escapades from corrupting both of her husband's daughters to starting over with a new family only to find herself drawn towards another vulnerable stepdaughter. Sit back and enjoy the ride with some of the naughtiest moms in the world!
title: Brandi's Girls & Other Stories
